headline: A Look at KLA (KLAC) Valuation After Strong Earnings and Upbeat Guidance
summary: KLA (KLAC) grabbed the spotlight after reporting upbeat quarterly results and issuing revenue and earnings guidance for the December quarter that came in above expectations. Investors are paying close attention to these signals. See our latest analysis for KLA. KLA’s upbeat earnings and guidance have not gone unnoticed by the market. The stock has surged recently, posting a 16.1% 30-day share price return and climbing over 94% year-to-date. In the longer term, total shareholder returns remain...

headline: KLA Corporation Q1 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: KLAC's fiscal first-quarter earnings and revenue beat estimates as strong semiconductor demand drives double-digit year-over-year growth.

raw.headline: KLA Corporation Q1 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: KLAC's fiscal first-quarter earnings and revenue beat estimates as strong semiconductor demand drives double-digit year-over-year growth.

headline: KLAC Q3 Deep Dive: AI, Advanced Packaging, and Process Control Drive Growth and Guidance
summary: Semiconductor manufacturing equipment maker KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) beat Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 13% year on year to $3.21 billion. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was better than expected at $3.23 billion at the midpoint, 1.4% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $8.81 per share was 2.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Musk's Pay Vote And BofA's Rare Investor Day Headline Busy Shareholder Event Stretch
summary: Despite some high-profile misses so far, S&P 500 EPS growth for Q3 accelerated to 9.2%. This week marks the first peak week of the Q3 '25 earnings season, with results from many Mag 7 names.
